title: Just Cause [PC]
description:
language: English
text : English, Polish

Synopsis
In Just Cause, a tropical South American paradise is about to
implode as numerous factions vie for power. Playing as Rico
Rodriguez, an undercover operative working for a top US secret
government agency, players are tasked with overthrowing the
corrupt government of San Esperito.
